column5: I don't think I could fish for 2-3 days without catching anything-  I don't have that kind of perseverence!!!!   18 strait days, wow
WOW! That second one is a fish of a lifetime!! Beautiful speciman! Thanks for sharing!

Hey everyone!!!  i havent posted in a while.  i just finished up another season on lac seul a few weeks ago.  this year was our second annual fall musky trip which we do once our camp is closed for the season.  BenBeattie, myself and a couple other guides from my lodge are trying to make this a yearly trip. big thanks to ben and his wife kelly for having us at their house.  i fished 11 days last year for zero musky although everyone else on the trip managed one or two.  this was my year.  i finally caught my first two muskies and they were beauties.         hopefully the pics work.  the smaller fish, my first musky ever, is a 46 incher, and the big one is a 51 incher.  it took me 18 long days of fishing to land my first musky, and it was well worth the wait.  i caught the 51 the next day.  thanks to my good buddy BenBeattie for seeing my frustration and not letting me leave till i caught a musky, or two.  cant wait till next fall.
i forgot to mention that we also boated a 49.5 incher as well.
Very nice fish perserverance always pays off when fishin skis
Congrats to you Mike! Great, clean fish too! And yes, that Ben knows his stuff and is a good guy.
Those are two nice lookin' Muskellunge!  Ben sure seems to know what he's doing. I've only read his stuff.
Beautiful fish! That 2nd one is a real tanker!
And you thought you had the bug before. Now you'r addicted....  That's nice fishing. Two PB in one trip.  Congratulations.
Congrats on pulling in those beauties!! Sure reminds me to get the boat changed up and out there...
thanks everyone!!!  im definitely truely addicted now.  unfortunately im gonna have to wait till next year to fish them again because im out west and there are no musky anywhere near here.
Well that was silly, moving to where there are no Muskies...
WTG Mike, that's a beaut for sure !!
Nice fish!!!  how did you get them?
thanks again everyone!!  pigeontroller, it definitely was a silly move on my behalf but its only temporary, haha!!!  bucktail, both fish were caught trolling a 10 inch jake.
Awesome report and pics FisherMike Congrats on those beauties Thanks for sharing Leechman
what a monster x2
Beauty looking Muskies Mike!!....congrats!
here is a better picture of the big one!!!
Those are a pair of beasts!!! Way to go!
WTG Mike, those are two gorgeous fish.  Did Ben get any?
Sweet fish MO! Hopefully next year I'll be able to make it up there! Daver is talking about a possible houseboat rental style muskie hunt next year...might be interesting!
Congrats on your first two beauties.  Thanks for sharing.
Hey Mike, it was awesome to have you guys here again.  Definitely one of my most anticipated annual trips!!  It was a thrill I'll never forget watching you catch that big one.  Congrats again buddy!!
Wow, those are some nice fish.  Good job!  I wish they grew like that in the kawarthas!!
Nice!
